i2s_audio.docs:
The `i2s_audio` media player platform allows you to play media from webservers and web streams via the I2S bus. This platform only works on ESP32 based chips.

*See also: [I2S Audio Media Player](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/i2s_audio.html#i2s-audio-media-player)*

stop.docs:
This action stops the current playback.

*See also: [Media Player Components](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-stop-action)*

pause.docs:
This action pauses the current playback.

*See also: [Media Player Components](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-pause-action)*

play.docs:
This action will resume playing the media player. A future change will allow specifying the `media_url` for starting a new stream.

*See also: [Media Player Components](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-play-action)*
